item.description: Book Blogger Hop is a weekly meme run by Coffee Addicted Writer. Every Friday, a question is posted for the book blog community to discuss. This week’s question is… Read or Clean? Read or Bake? Read or Make Dinner? What would be your choice? Submitted by Elizabeth @ Silver’s Reviews There are quite a lot of questions for today! Read or Clean? If I play my cards right, both!
